reviews.review: cool game, wacky ending, fun puzzles
Its a fun game. The story and sound track are pretty neat also
Fun, with lots of easter eggs! And lots of stuff to mess with hehe
ta bn, un juego que te ocupa las 3 neuronas que te quedan, ta bueno

I decided to run through single player part of the game for the (3rd?) time, it's been a fair amount of years since I've done so. The game doesn't hold a light to games these days, it blows holes of fire through them. Every bit of dialogue slaps, every joke hits, and the puzzles are well designed. If you don't have this game by now, don't even wait for a sale, just buy it; an absolute masterpiece

If you haven’t played this game yet, BUY IT. It is still one of the greatest puzzle games ever made, and to this day, GLaDOS (from this game) and Handsome Jack (Borderlands 2) are still tied for the title of best video game villain in my opinion.

Excelente continuación en la que se añaden nuevos personajes y herramientas para ampliar las posibilidades de su desafió, amplia su duración ha costa de un ritmo más pausado y añade un modo cooperativo bien ejecutado.
Só o melhor jogo da vida. Joguei pela primeira vez quando quebrei o pé e fiquei em casa durante 60 dias. Não curou meu pé, mas me fez feliz.
While I enjoyed the gameplay, the best part was by far the GLaDOS and Cave Johnson lines. Valve gave them some of the funniest lines ever written. Need I say more?
Muito divertido jogar sozinho e com um amigo é bem maneiro jogo pois vocês dois ficam pensando juntos e se empolgam quando passam de uma fase difícil RECOMENDO 100%.
아직까지 포탈에 비빌만한 1인칭 3d 퍼즐겜은 안나온 것 같다.

Продолжение потрясающей головоломки, игра является одной из культовых в серии головоломок, зависнуть здесь можно надолго
Всем советую!
A great successor to one of the best puzzle games of all time.
yes yes if u love puzzles and dark humour u should get this loads and loads of fun

Se você jogar sozinho você vai se divertir. Tem uma história muito boa que segue a trilogia do primeiro jogo 
Se você entrar no modo Co-op vai se divertir ainda mais. Pois la você não vai passar os níveis sozinho, vai ter sempre alguém te ajudando (ou atrapalhando), então eu recomendo muito você comprar esse jogo. O preço dele vale muito apena.
Portal 2 expands on Portal 1 in so many ways, especially the ability to create your own puzzle maps.

Portal 2 одна из моих самых любимых игра, но я уже не помню почему. Но рекомендую. 
Кстати, за сколько времени вы прошли?
+Кооп интересный.
really good game, the graphics are still good
1 потерянный друг во время прохождения коопа из 1-ого. Балдёжно.

What is there to say, really? 

It's Portal 2, we've seen it, we've loved it.
Amazing sequel. Much longer game with more puzzles to solve, and the story is great to follow
I kinda like it, I haven't played it too much though.

This is the best experience in the world. Portal and Portal 2 are very interesting games i've ever seen. So original, so realistic, so much secrets and story etc. I recommend these two games for you, it's worth the price. Thank you Valve :).

Охрененная игра. Помимо сюжета есть кооперативный режим, то есть... зачем я это пишу? короче, после прохождения сюжета, игру не бросишь. Но всё же советую пройти первую часть, которую лучше запират... купить, обязательно,

Забавная, прикольная...
Только при игре в кооперативе друзья понимают какой ты тормоз...)
Eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe

I have been LOVING playing this game with a friend while in lockdown.
The puzzles are challenging enough to hold your interest and make you feel just a bit smug for solving, with the occasional easier one to keep the momentum going.
Highly recommended

Could easily be considered the single greatest video game of all time. It goes on sale for less than $2 regularly and if you are even slightly a valve fan or puzzle game fan you should buy this and play it.
When I play this game, I always remember memories with my best friend Bob

taki girl go uwu now i dont make the rules i just shit piss

I’m assuming pretty much everyone who has played the first game has already given this a try, if not, go play that first game. It builds on everything the first did right and scales up the areas you are going to be running through. It has a very intuitive design that teaches you how to play, it doesn’t over explain anything though. Obviously, the humor is going to be hit or miss for you, but I think everyone will find at least one part to chuckle at.
it is a fun puzzle game

Pros and Cons
Pros
It's Portal 2
Writing is witty
Character Development is great
Puzzles are excellently designed

Cons
Low replay value but that gets overshadowed by the fact that its a great game to come back to after a good amount of time

I give Portal 2 a 10/10

친구랑 멀티로 플레이했는데 인게임에서 마이크 끄는법을 몰라서 인게임 마이크 사용했습니다 .. 
마이크 끄는법 다들 알아와서 하세요 인게임 마이크 쓰면 멀미나더라고요 한 두시간하고 멀미때문에 누워있다가 다시하고 그랬어요 
근데 게임은 정말 재밌습니다 친구랑 둘이서 하면서 엄청 웃은듯 ㅋㅋㅋ 혼자하는 모드는 아직 안해봤지만 
멀티는 일단 존잼 !

an amazing sequel to portal 2 with great humor and fun puzzles, and it even doubles as a coop game that you can solve puzzles with your buddy

The primary purpose of this game is to solve puzzles using a limited tool set, but it never gets stale. The story is amazingly rich and told in a very organic way with almost no exposition. A well crafted game that I enjoyed from beginning to end.
Love this game, the puzzles are challenging and the story is very absorbing. Highly recommend!
